data.title: Emmanuel Steinschneider
data.meta_description: Emmanuel Efimovich Steinschneider , was a Russian Empire and USSR physician and medical researcher, best known for his studies on influenza, malaria, typhoid, typhus, dysentery and other infections that were rampant during the first half of the 20th century.
